About.title: About Us

hero.title: Empowering Change Through Volunteerism
hero.subtitle: We connect passionate volunteers with meaningful opportunities to create positive impact in communities across Thailand and beyond.

mission.title: Our Purpose
mission.subtitle: Discover what drives us to create meaningful connections between volunteers and organizations.
mission.missionText: To bridge the gap between passionate volunteers and impactful organizations, creating a sustainable ecosystem where everyone can contribute to positive social change and community development.
mission.visionText: A world where volunteerism is accessible, impactful, and celebrated - where every person has the opportunity to contribute their unique skills and passion to building stronger communities.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We believe in the power of empathy and understanding to drive meaningful change in our communities.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Together we achieve more. We foster partnerships between volunteers, organizations, and communities.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Every action matters. We focus on creating measurable, positive change in the world around us.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies to make volunteerism more accessible and effective.

achievements.title: Our Impact So Far
achievements.subtitle: Numbers that tell our story of positive change

features.title: What We Offer
features.subtitle: Comprehensive support for volunteers and organizations

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to start making a difference

step1.title: Discover Opportunities
step1.description: Browse through hundreds of volunteer opportunities from verified organizations across different causes and locations.

step2.title: Connect & Engage
step2.description: Join events, connect with like-minded volunteers, and start building meaningful relationships within the community.

step3.title: Create Impact
step3.description: Make a real difference through your volunteer work and track your impact through our platform.

founder.name: ASAiASA Founder
founder.description: Passionate about connecting people with meaningful volunteer opportunities and building stronger communities.

communityManager.name: Community Manager
communityManager.description: Dedicated to fostering relationships between volunteers and organizations, ensuring positive experiences for all.

techLead.name: Technology Director
techLead.description: Leading the technical innovation to make our platform more accessible, user-friendly, and impactful.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of volunteers who are already creating positive change in their communities.
